RuleSet.Name: schema/dbcreate/pgsql/crsp_read_dbtablename.pgsql
RuleSet.GenRule: $switch SecScope None implPgSqlSPLockTableRetSelectByPKeyNormal System implPgSqlSPLockTableRetSelectByPKeyNormal Cluster implPgSqlSPLockTableRetSelectByPKeyRestrictCluster Tenant implPgSqlSPLockTableRetSelectByPKeyRestrictTenant default error$

return query select $poptop Table implPgSqlSelectTableColumns$, $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implPgSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$ for update;

if( isSystemUser ) then return query select $implPgSqlSelectTableColumns$, $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implPgSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$ for update; else return query select $implPgSqlSelectTableColumns$, $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implPgSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$ and $lower reference ClusterIdColumn reference Table ClassCode$.$reference ClusterIdColumn DbColumnName$ = secClusterId for update; end if;

if( isSystemUser ) then return query select $implPgSqlSelectTableColumns$, $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implPgSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$ for update; else return query select $implPgSqlSelectTableColumns$, $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implPgSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$ and $lower reference TenantIdColumn reference Table ClassCode$.$reference TenantIdColumn DbColumnName$ = secTenantId for update; end if;
$switch SecScope None empty System empty Cluster implPgSqlSPReadTableCheckCluster Tenant implPgSqlSPReadTableCheckTenant default error$
and $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.ClassCode = '$poptop Table ClassCode$'

$switch SecScope None implPgSqlSPLockTableRetSubSelectByPKeyNormal System implPgSqlSPLockTableRetSubSelectByPKeyNormal Cluster implPgSqlSPLockTableRetSubSelectByPKeyRestrictCluster Tenant implPgSqlSPLockTableRetSubSelectByPKeyRestrictTenant default error$

$implPgSqlLockTables$ return query select $poptop Table implPgSqlSelectTableColumns$, $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implPgSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$;

if( isSystemUser ) then$implPgSqlLockTables$ return query select $implPgSqlSelectTableColumns$, $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implPgSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$; else$implPgSqlLockTables$ return query select $implPgSqlSelectTableColumns$, $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implPgSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$ and $lower reference ClusterIdColumn reference Table ClassCode$.$reference ClusterIdColumn DbColumnName$ = secClusterId; end if;

if( isSystemUser ) then$implPgSqlLockTables$ return query select $implPgSqlSelectTableColumns$, $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implPgSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$; else$implPgSqlLockTables$ return query select $implPgSqlSelectTableColumns$, $lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ as $lower ClassCode$$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implPgSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$ and $lower reference TenantIdColumn reference Table ClassCode$.$reference TenantIdColumn DbColumnName$ = secTenantId; end if;

$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable implPgSqlLockTables$ select $iterate Columns( first implPgSqlLockSelectCol each implPgSqlLockSelectCommaCol )$ into $iterate Columns( first implPgSqlLockIntoOldVar each implPgSqlLockIntoCommaOldVar )$ from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlLockWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlLockWhereAndFragBindVar )$ for update;

select ClassCode$iterate Columns( each implPgSqlLockSelectCommaCol )$, revision into oldClassCode$iterate Columns( each implPgSqlLockIntoCommaOldVar )$, oldRevision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlLockWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlLockWhereAndFragBindVar )$ for update;

select $iterate Columns( first implPgSqlLockSelectCol each implPgSqlLockSelectCommaCol )$, revision into $iterate Columns( first implPgSqlLockIntoOldVar each implPgSqlLockIntoCommaOldVar )$, oldRevision from $lower DbSchemaName$.$DbTableName$ where $reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implPgSqlLockWhereFragBindVar each implPgSqlLockWhereAndFragBindVar )$ for update;
$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable declSPOldVars$$iterate Columns( each declSPOldDataVar )$
$switch HasSubClasses yes declSPOldClassCode default empty$$iterate Columns( each declSPOldVar )$ oldRevision int;
$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable implSPIntoOldVars$$iterate Columns( each implSPIntoOldDataVar )$
